messages.title: My Priorities for Mitcham and Morden

keyPolicies.policyTitle: INVESTING IN OUR LOCAL NHS SERVICES
keyPolicies.policyDescription: St Helier faces a bright and secure future, with the Conservatives spending millions on improving the hospital. I will continue to fight for more investment in our local NHS services.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: FIGHTING CRIME IN MITCHAM AND MORDEN
keyPolicies.policyDescription: The Prime Minister has announced funding for 1300 more police officers in London. I will ensure that Mitcham and Morden gets its fair share of these new officers.

I use the Northern Line every day, and I know how the rush hour commute can be a nightmare. With the Northern Line operating during busy periods at 130 percent capacity, I will campaign for additional trains and a more frequent service, and against any cuts to bus services.

contactInformation.address: Promoted by Joe Hamilton on behalf of Toby Williams, both at 5-3 Summerstown, London, SW17 0BQ.
